snippet.title: NEW PROJECT: AI ROBOT! | Robot Daycare [EN] Part 1
snippet.description:
'Robot Daycare' is a thought provoking visual novel by kigyo. It’s about a group of college students who build and program a robot with an artificial intelligence. Will this new robot friend help the three guys to cope with their past, or will it only make things worse?

For more information and to try the game yourself, visit: https://kigyo.itch.io/robot-daycare.
You can also follow the developer on Twitter to stay updated about future projects: https://twitter.com/KigyoDev.

'Three perpetually bickering college students team up to create an AI, but will their quest for a robotic child end up as a crash course in parenting or self-defense?
Discover the secret this group of "friends" is hiding and choose if you want to help them forgive and forget ... or fuel the conflict.' – description by the dev, kigyo

The graphics of my videos should be fine in this series apart from a few fast scene transitions every now and then ^^

Outro song by Michał Michalski: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLNzDgnJ8x-hj7B0Ye911GQ
Outro visuals by Adege: https://pixabay.com/users/adege-4994132/ (Pixabay License)

You have suggestions, remarks or constructive critique regarding my gameplay and commentary? Feel free to write them in the comment section below.

Have a nice day :)
